epics.title: User Authentication and Authorization
epics.summary: Implement secure user authentication and authorization.
epics.description: Develop a robust authentication mechanism that supports multi-factor authentication, ensuring secure access to the portal. Implement role-based access controls to restrict access based on user profiles and authorization levels.

epics.title: Responsive Design
epics.summary: Ensure the portal is responsive across various devices.
epics.description: Create a responsive design for the portal that provides a consistent user experience across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices. The design should adapt to different screen sizes and resolutions seamlessly.

epics.title: Personalized User Dashboard
epics.summary: Develop a personalized user dashboard based on user profile.
epics.description: Build a dashboard that displays personalized banking products and services tailored to the user's profile and eligibility. The dashboard should be intuitive and user-friendly, providing quick access to essential features.

epics.title: Account Opening and Service Modifications
epics.summary: Enable users to submit account opening and service modification requests.
epics.description: Implement a streamlined workflow for users to submit account opening and service modification requests with minimal clicks. Ensure that users can save incomplete applications and return to them later. Provide the ability to upload necessary documentation directly through the interface.

epics.title: Real-Time Status Updates and Notifications
epics.summary: Provide real-time status updates and notifications for user requests.
epics.description: Develop a system to provide real-time status updates and email notifications regarding user-submitted requests. Ensure users are kept informed about the progress and status of their requests efficiently.

epics.title: Interaction History
epics.summary: Maintain a comprehensive history of all user interactions.
epics.description: Develop a system to store and display a comprehensive history of all user interactions within the portal. Ensure that sensitive financial data is securely maintained and accessible to users for their records.

epics.title: Core Banking System Integration
epics.summary: Integrate the portal with the bank's core banking system.
epics.description: Ensure seamless integration of the portal with the bank's existing core banking system. Maintain a separate database for the portal to ensure optimal performance and reliability, while ensuring data consistency between the systems.

user_stories.title: Implement multi-factor authentication
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to authenticate using multi-factor authentication, so that my access to the portal is secure.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Authentication must support at least two factors, including password and one-time code.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User must authenticate with both a password and a one-time code.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a registered user, When they log in, Then they must provide both a password and a one-time code to access the portal.

user_stories.title: Implement role-based access controls
user_stories.description: As an admin, I want to assign roles to users, so that their access can be restricted based on their profile and authorization levels.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Roles must be configurable, and access must be restricted based on roles.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Admin must be able to assign roles and restrict access based on roles.
user_stories.test_cases: Given an admin, When they assign roles, Then users must have access restricted based on their role.

user_stories.title: Secure access to the portal
user_stories.description: As a user, I want secure access to the portal, so that my data remains protected.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Access must be encrypted and comply with security standards.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Access must be encrypted and secure.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user, When they access the portal, Then their access must be encrypted and secure.

user_stories.title: Ensure responsive design for mobile devices
user_stories.description: As a user, I want the portal to be responsive on my mobile device, so that I get a consistent experience.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Design must adapt to different screen sizes and resolutions.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Portal must be responsive on mobile devices.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user on a mobile device, When they access the portal, Then the portal must adapt to their screen size.

user_stories.title: Ensure responsive design for tablet devices
user_stories.description: As a user, I want the portal to be responsive on my tablet, so that I get a consistent experience.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Design must adapt to different screen sizes and resolutions.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Portal must be responsive on tablet devices.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user on a tablet device, When they access the portal, Then the portal must adapt to their screen size.

user_stories.title: Ensure responsive design for desktop devices
user_stories.description: As a user, I want the portal to be responsive on my desktop, so that I get a consistent experience.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Design must adapt to different screen sizes and resolutions.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Portal must be responsive on desktop devices.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user on a desktop device, When they access the portal, Then the portal must adapt to their screen size.

user_stories.title: Display personalized banking products
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to see banking products tailored to my profile, so that I get relevant product recommendations.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Products must be displayed based on user profile and eligibility.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Dashboard must display products based on user profile.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user with a profile, When they access the dashboard, Then they must see products tailored to their profile.

user_stories.title: Provide intuitive and user-friendly dashboard
user_stories.description: As a user, I want an intuitive dashboard, so that I can easily navigate and access essential features.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Dashboard must be intuitive and user-friendly.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Dashboard must be easy to navigate and user-friendly.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user, When they access the dashboard, Then they must find it easy to navigate.

user_stories.title: Quick access to essential features
user_stories.description: As a user, I want quick access to essential features, so that I can perform important actions efficiently.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Essential features must be easily accessible.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Dashboard must provide quick access to essential features.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user, When they access the dashboard, Then they must have quick access to essential features.

user_stories.title: Streamlined account opening workflow
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to submit account opening requests with minimal clicks, so that the process is efficient.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Workflow must be streamlined with minimal steps.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users must submit account requests with minimal clicks.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user, When they request to open an account, Then they must complete the process with minimal steps.

user_stories.title: Save and return to incomplete applications
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to save incomplete applications, so that I can return to them later.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Users must be able to save and resume applications.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users must save and resume incomplete applications.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user, When they save an application, Then they must resume it later.

user_stories.title: Upload necessary documentation
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to upload necessary documentation, so that my account request can be processed.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Users must upload required documents through the interface.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users must upload necessary documents for requests.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user, When they submit a request, Then they must upload necessary documents.

user_stories.title: Real-time status updates for user requests
user_stories.description: As a user, I want real-time status updates for my requests, so that I am informed about the progress.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: System must provide real-time updates.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users must receive real-time status updates.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user, When they submit a request, Then they must receive real-time status updates.

user_stories.title: Email notifications for status changes
user_stories.description: As a user, I want email notifications for status changes, so that I am informed without logging in.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: System must send email notifications for status changes.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users must receive email notifications for status changes.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user, When their request status changes, Then they must receive an email notification.

user_stories.title: Efficient notification system
user_stories.description: As a user, I want an efficient notification system, so that I am kept informed promptly.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Notification system must be efficient and timely.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Notification system must operate promptly.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user, When a status changes, Then they must receive a notification promptly.

user_stories.title: Maintain interaction history
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to see a history of my interactions, so that I can keep track of my activities.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: System must store and display interaction history.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users must see a history of their interactions.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user, When they request interaction history, Then they must see all their past interactions.

user_stories.title: Securely maintain financial data
user_stories.description: As a user, I want my financial data to be secure, so that my information is protected.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Sensitive financial data must be securely maintained.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Financial data must be securely stored and accessible to users.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user, When they access financial data, Then it must be secure and accessible only to them.

user_stories.title: Accessible interaction records
user_stories.description: As a user, I want my interaction records to be accessible, so that I can review them.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Interaction records must be accessible to users.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users must access their interaction records.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user, When they request interaction records, Then the records must be accessible to them.

user_stories.title: Integrate with core banking system
user_stories.description: As a user, I want the portal to integrate with the bank's core banking system, so that I get seamless banking services.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: System must integrate with the bank's core banking system.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Portal must integrate with the core banking system.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user, When they use the portal, Then it must integrate with the core banking system.

user_stories.title: Maintain separate database for the portal
user_stories.description: As a user, I want the portal to maintain a separate database, so that it performs efficiently.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Database must be separate for the portal while ensuring data consistency.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Portal must maintain a separate database.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user, When they use the portal, Then it must perform efficiently with a separate database.

user_stories.title: Ensure data consistency between systems
user_stories.description: As a user, I want data consistency between the portal and core banking system, so that my information is accurate.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Data must be consistent between the systems.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Data must be consistent between the portal and core banking system.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user, When they check their information, Then data must be consistent between systems.

architecture_generation.description: This architecture diagram represents a secure, responsive, and user-friendly self-service banking portal using various Azure services for frontend, backend, storage, integration, notifications, security, monitoring, and DevOps.

architecture_validation.updatedDescription: The architecture diagram has been enhanced to address identified gaps in security, reliability, and operational excellence. Azure Web Application Firewall (WAF) has been added to protect the frontend, and geo-replication has been implemented for Azure SQL Database and Azure Blob Storage to ensure disaster recovery. Monitoring services like Azure Monitor are recommended for backend services, and cost optimization and performance efficiency strategies are suggested. The architecture now aligns more closely with the Azure Well-Architected Framework, achieving a higher quality rating.
